on_select_out_of_stock.dynamic_item_id_mismatch: Dynamic_item_id: 05485a65a17a is missing from error payload and should be provided in the correct form with proper error_code and item_id,dynamic_item_id,etc. For Example: if base item "I1" for dynamic item "DI1" and customization "C15" for dynamic item "DI2" are both out of stock, error.message would be encoded as: "[{"dynamic_item_id":"DI1","item_id":"I1","error":"40002"}, {"dynamic_item_id":"DI2","customization_id":"C15","customization_group_id":"CG3","error":"40002"}]"
